name: Promise of a Green Mars
description:
Done to the #shenanijam theme [Ep75] Hanging out to Mars. "Promise for a Green Mars" is a narrative story about keeping a promise to a dead wife. Following 80's years of one man's mission to save humanity by committing himself to the terraforming of Mars, a nigh on impossible task, you must make choices that will help you to keep a promise made to your wife that she will bear fruit on a new world with a second chance.

How far will you go for that promise? What choices will you make to see it through? What sacrifices will you make for the Promise of a Green Mars.

Notes: The demo currently here was crammed into 17 hours of a 48 hour GameJam and is only the introduction to a much larger game in development. It is currently being written on Gamemaker 2 with RPG maker being used for storyboarding.
